summary: A two handed spellsword with her own custom conjure spriggan spell.  Available in UNP, CBBE, and SeveNBase; with or without face tattoo
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][color=#1e84cc][size=6][b]Erecde Cours Fionessa Fae[/b][/size][/color]

Permission granted for follower creation by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/24677469/?tb=feed&pUp=1]Erecde Cours[/url]

[url=https://soundcloud.com/mythocs/mythocs-fioness-a-fae-2k17-redo][img]https://s5.postimg.org/yvq9f19jb/24677469_1483627678.jpg[/img][/url]

[i][color=#c9daf8][b]*To hear her soundtrack please click on above image.*[/b][/color][/i]

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/7rdld39fr/cXV6tcx.jpg[/img]
[/font][/center][center][font=Verdana][img]https://s5.postimg.org/q8kmqqt53/Info.png[/img]
Name:  Fionessa Fae
Race:  Custom Nord Based (Fae)
Voice:  Female Sultry
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  1.00
Weight:  54
Body:  Base UNP, CBBE, SeveNBase
Skin:  Demoniac (2k)
Armor:  SevenWardrobe/Shocky's Tumblr Gift (SeveNBase Version Only)
Weapon:  Nordic Spear
Location:  Whiterun - Drunken Huntsman

Class:  Spellsword
Style:  Boss Two Handed

Levels with player.
Skills/Perks:  Two Hand, Restoration, Conjuration, Illusion, Alteration, Archery, Light Armor
Spells:  Conjure Spriggan, Healing, Calm, Pacify, Harmony, Stoneflesh

Tested with EFF & AFT
ENBs Pictured:  Snapdragon, Vividian, RealVision

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/spjrb69af/QE63COY.jpg[/img]

Tattoo & Non-Tattoo Versions Available

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/7hb4qv153/Tattoo_Version.jpg[/img][img]https://s5.postimg.org/6qiel2yrr/No_Tattoo_Version.jpg[/img]

[youtube]dCdV3LfVX4M[/youtube][youtube]6oOkQW2QhV8[/youtube]
[img]https://s5.postimg.org/czbb4dts7/Requirements.png[/img]
[u]SeveNBase Armor & No Armor Version[/u]

BBP/TBBP Compatible Skeleton

[u]No Armor Versions[/u]

None Known At This Time

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/3q94u9kw7/Recommended.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Facelight[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76051/?]Are You There[/url]

[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE
[/url]
[img]https://s5.postimg.org/iidullqtj/Known_Issues.png[/img]
Some ENBs may show slight skin discoloration between body and head

Armor may clip during some poses/animations

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/xqw79nn2f/20170107191501_1.jpg[/img]

Manual or your favorite mod manager

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/4v36zn7d3/Uninstall.png[/img]
Manual or your favorite mod manager

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/w0kqxw2yv/Many_Thanks_To.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/24677469/?tb=feed&pUp=1]Erecde Cours[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10858658/?]sfeile
[/url][url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/218944591881610/]Skyrim Mods & Modders[/url]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/1273841859340346/]Children of Akatosh[/url]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/bethesdamods/]Bethesda Mod Creation Collective[/url]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/SkyrimModsFollowerHoarders/]Skyrim Mods Follower Hoarders[/url][url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/755816797880543/]
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5973055/?]Dragonstar99

[/url][img]https://s5.postimg.org/58rwcenpj/amAtbUP.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/8r3pgoykn/Q&A.png[/img]
Q:  Why do a Q & A?
A:  I have no freaking clue

Q:  Why do you make so many followers?
A:  I'm a follower hoarder/addict; since there is no Followers Anon I only have Nexus.

Q:  Will you release the Racemenu preset?
A:  Not without express permission from Erecde Cours

Q:  What are the other armors shown in screenshots?
A:  UNP Ranger & Underworld Armors

Q:  Will you change *insert request here*?
A:  My apologies but this is not my character so I will not make changes to appearance.

Q:  Do you take requests, suggestions, complaints?
A:  I'm open to all requests, suggestions, and feedback as long as they are polite.

Q:  Would you consider turning my preset into a follower?
A:  Sure, what'cha got.
A:  I will probably refuse any little girl/boy looking follower requests though.

Q:  Why isn't this Q & A funny?
A:  Because I'm a boring person *shrugs shoulders*

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/cdhquj9c7/CreditsResources.png[/img]

[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34346/?]Smile in HD
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60769/?]Stoja's Warpaints
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54118/?]The Neith Team Warpaints[/url]
Bethesdsa

*If I forgot anyone; please kindly remind me*

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/b4ygmn6rr/Permissions.png[/img]
This follower is the combination of the work of others.  Please obtain their permissions in addition to mine.

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/ymnmrzqfb/24677469_1483631589.jpg[/img]

[color=#1e84cc][size=4]PLEASE CHECK OUT MY OTHER FOLLOWERS:[/size][/color][/font]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/35629995/?tb=mods&pUp=1][img]https://s5.postimg.org/vn7axqznr/mfeile1974_Link.png[/img][/url][/center][center][/center]
